actions.name: Actions
actions.description: Cloak of Darkness [Cast, Near Aura]: Extinguishes all light sources, and the Area becomes magic darkness. If the light source was Magic, it is dispelled. Bite [Melee Attack]: 3 (d6) Statblocks // Cryptids Statblocks // Cryptids 137 137 Bestiary Dobar-Chú TL: 5.8 Large Cryptid The "water devil" is a semi-aquatic mammal that appears to be a huge otter HD: 6 (27 HP) Speed: 30' (Swim 40') Zone: Frontline Morale: 9 # Appearing: d3 Armor: 2 [as Chain] Weak: Shock ACTIONS Multi-Attack: 2×Claw and 1×Bite Claw [Melee Attack]: 7 (2d6) Bite [Melee Attack]: 10 (3d6)
